column5: me and my friend rich fished a tourny out of hay bay bite was tough 42 boats 4 fish were brought to the scale we ended up in 3rd place and won the big draw prize a four man ice clam.boy did we get a lot of stair's when we were jiging at shermans with that monster in the front in the front of my boat. we cought some trolling with wally divers and a few jiging at 70 feet
We launched there the day of that tournament.  Congrats on the winnings!  We heard not many fish were caught.  Was tough out there for sure.
Congrats, and thanks for the info. I will be heading up there saturday, i guess its gonna be a long day
